articles.title: Ethereum, Solana Defy L1 Myth — Bitwise CIO Sees Prediction Markets Changing Everything
articles.summary: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan argues that Ethereum and Solana are proving wrong the prevailing narrative that only one Layer 1 blockchain can dominate, with both chains finding distinct use cases and thriving simultaneously. This multi-chain reality creates more robust infrastructure for prediction markets, giving bettors access to diverse platforms with different fee structures, speed capabilities, and liquidity pools rather than being locked into a single ecosystem.

articles.title: $10 Kalshi Promo Code SILIVE upgraded in CA for Celtics vs. Lakers tonight!
articles.summary: Kalshi upgraded their promotional code SILIVE to offer $10 in credits for California users ahead of tonight's Celtics vs Lakers game. The targeted geographic promotion signals prediction markets are testing localized marketing strategies to capture regional betting interest around marquee NBA matchups.

articles.title: TN Court Grants Kalshi’s Motion For Preliminary Injunction On Sports Predictions
articles.summary: A Tennessee court granted Kalshi's preliminary injunction against state regulators who tried to block the platform from offering sports prediction markets to Tennessee residents. This ruling strengthens the legal precedent that prediction markets operate differently from traditional sports betting and may face less restrictive state gambling laws.

articles.title: Polymarket Bitcoin Price Prediction Says $75K, But Charts Don't
articles.summary: Polymarket traders are betting Bitcoin will hit $75K by year-end while technical charts suggest the rally may have peaked around current levels. The disconnect shows how prediction markets can diverge from traditional analysis, creating arbitrage opportunities for traders who can correctly identify which signal proves more reliable.

articles.title: Canada vs USA Olympic Men's Hockey Prediction: Best Odds at Prediction Markets like Kalshi
articles.summary: Canada opened as heavy favorites over the USA in Olympic men's hockey betting markets, with most books pricing them around -180 to -200 despite both teams fielding mostly minor league players due to NHL participation uncertainty. The wide spread creates arbitrage opportunities across different prediction platforms, especially on Kalshi where recreational bettors often misprice international hockey matchups compared to traditional sportsbooks.
